verses.verse: Where is your <S%H1730>beloved<s%> <S%H1980>gone<s%>, O you <S%H3303>fairest<s%> among <S%H802>women<s%>? where is your <S%H1730>beloved<s%> turned <S%H6437>aside<s%>? that we may seek him with <S%H1245>you<s%>.

My <S%H1730>beloved<s%> is gone <S%H3381>down<s%> into his <S%H1588>garden<s%>, to the <S%H6170>beds<s%> of <S%H1314>spices<s%>, to <S%H7462>feed<s%> in the <S%H1588>gardens<s%>, and to <S%H3950>gather<s%> <S%H7799>lilies<s%>.
I am my <S%H1730>beloved<s%>'s, and my <S%H1730>beloved<s%> is <S%H7462>mine<s%>: he feeds among the <S%H7799>lilies<s%>.
You are <S%H3303>beautiful<s%>, O my <S%H7474>love<s%>, as <S%H8656>Tirzah<s%>, <S%H5000>fitting<s%> as <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, <S%H366>terrible<s%> as a army with <S%H1713>banners<s%>.

Turn <S%H5437>away<s%> your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> from <S%H1992>me<s%>, for they have <S%H7292>overcome<s%> <S%H8181>me<s%>: your hair is as a <S%H5739>flock<s%> of <S%H5795>goats<s%> that <S%H1570>appear<s%> from <S%H1568>Gilead<s%>.

Your <S%H8127>teeth<s%> are as a <S%H5739>flock<s%> of <S%H7353>sheep<s%> which go <S%H5927>up<s%> from the <S%H7367>washing<s%>, whereof every one bears <S%H8382>twins<s%>, and there is not one childless among <S%H7909>them<s%>.
As a <S%H6400>piece<s%> of a <S%H7416>pomegranate<s%> are your <S%H7541>temples<s%> <S%H1157>inside<s%> your <S%H6777>locks<s%>.

My <S%H3123>dove<s%>, my <S%H8535>undefiled<s%> is but <S%H259>one<s%>; she is the only <S%H259>one<s%> of her <S%H517>mother<s%>, she is the <S%H1249>choice<s%> one of her that <S%H3205>bore<s%> <S%H1323>her<s%>. The daughters <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H833>her<s%>, and blessed <S%H4436>her<s%>; Yes, the queens and the <S%H6370>concubines<s%>, and they praised <S%H1984>her<s%>.

Who is she that looks <S%H8259>forth<s%> as the <S%H7837>morning<s%>, <S%H3303>fair<s%> as the <S%H3842>moon<s%>, <S%H1249>clear<s%> as the <S%H2535>sun<s%>, and <S%H366>terrible<s%> as a army with <S%H1713>banners<s%>?

I went <S%H3381>down<s%> into the <S%H1594>garden<s%> of <S%H93>nuts<s%> to <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H3>fruits<s%> of the <S%H5158>valley<s%>, and to <S%H7200>see<s%> whether the <S%H1612>vine<s%> <S%H6524>flourished<s%>, and the <S%H7416>pomegranates<s%> <S%H5132>budded<s%>.
Or ever I was <S%H3045>aware<s%>, my <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H7760>made<s%> me like the <S%H4818>chariots<s%> of <S%H5993>Amminadib<s%>.

<S%H7725>Return<s%>, <S%H7725>return<s%>, O <S%H7759>Shulamite<s%>; <S%H7725>return<s%>, <S%H7725>return<s%>, that we may <S%H2372>look<s%> upon <S%H2372>you<s%>. What will you see in the <S%H7759>Shulamite<s%>? As it were the <S%H4246>company<s%> of two <S%H4264>armies<s%>.
